description:
>🚨 For Giveaway Winners, Creators & Early Supporters only !🚨
#### 

## About

Welcome to IOTAcribs🏠 ! And welcome to Soonacity🏙️ !
#### 
Soonacity is the first limited collection with *501 OG IOTAcribs* here on Soonaverse!
They contain artworks of cute little mansions and are inspired by the MTV cribs tv show from the 2000's. Every handcrafted crib will have unique features – no two are exactly alike!
#### 
## Mint information

The initial mint will already start here, before the main mint on:
**Monday night Apr 11, 00:00 CEST**
#### 
You can already browse through the collection on our website:
#### 
👉 http://iotacribs.io/cribs
#### 
You will be able to randomly mint a crib for free (100% discount). 
The price is set to 125 MIOTA but in the checkout the discount will be applied. Note that you still have to pay 1 MIOTA due to dust protection. But we will refund your 1 MIOTA asap!
#### 
The total 35 Giveaway cribs (incl. creators & early supporters) were randomly chosen from the 55 lowest ranked Soonacity cribs (lowest rarity rank percentile / 10%).
The Crib IDs in the 35 Giveaway Pool are e.g. #027, #043, #193, #486, #461, #444 ...
#### 
If you want more cribs head over to the main mint:
#### 
👉 https://soonaverse.com/collection/0xa60d33c3787e1e17a8df4ba16f4429317fa53327
#### 

## We got you covered
#### 
Every crib comes with rights and other perks:
#### 
- 🖼️ ownership & rights on our beautiful artwork
- 👷 designed by real-world architects
- ✍️ carefully crafted by hand
- 1️⃣ First ever NFT home on the Tangle!
- 🔄 potential upgrades (2D-> 3D-> metaverse)
- 📑 Whitelist places
- 📬 future Airdrops
- 🔐 OG crib owner access & 🎁 other future benefits ...
#### 
There is still a lot more to come. We are all excited for the future of IOTA's NFTs and metaverse. Either way, we want to be part of that adventure and won't stop building this future with our IOTAcribs community!
name: IOTAcribs limited OG collection - Soonacity [Giveaway]
